data.prayer: Spirit, train the church of Chişinău, Moldova to trust with all their hearts, and you will make their paths straight.
data.verse: Trust in Yahweh with all your heart, and don’t lean on your own understanding. In all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make your paths straight.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Chişinău, Moldova
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Chişinău, Moldova. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Chişinău to agree with you in prayer.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: the state of Chişinău has (about) 30,613 people who know Jesus, 469,742 people who know about him culturally, and 162,546 people who are far from Jesus.
Jesus, help the church in the state of Chişinău to not rely on buildings or programs, but on your Spirit and the simple faithfulness of every believer.
Spirit, give the disciples of the the state of Chişinău words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.prayer: Good Shepherd, thank you that you know the name of each of the 30,613 believers in Chişinău.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd; I know my sheep and my sheep know me

data.section_summary:
the state of Chişinău, Moldova has a population of 662,900.

We estimate Chişinău has 30,613 people who might know Jesus, 469,742 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 162,546 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 21 neighbors who need Jesus.
